title: Kayla Esser
text:
Kayla Esser is a graduate student at the Dalla Lana School of Public Health. She is currently a research manager at SickKids, as well as a work-study student at the Centre for Vaccine Preventable Diseases.


University of Toronto | Toronto, ON
Master of Public Health in Epidemiology | Sept 2022 - June 2024
McMaster University | Hamilton, ON
Bachelor of Arts and Science and Psychology, Neuroscience and Behaviour | Sept 2013 - June 2018



The Hospital for Sick Children | Clinical Research Project Manager | June 2020 - present
